title: Coronavirus Concerns Prompt Candidates to CFH: Campaign From Home
description: The coronavirus outbreak is forcing 2020 candidates to suspend rallies, town halls and other events they typically use to connect with voters. Photo: Scott Olson/Getty Images
content:
How the New Coronavirus Became a Global Pandemic
3/17/2020On Dec. 1, 2019, a patient in Wuhan, China, started showing symptoms of what doctors determined was a new coronavirus. Since then, the virus has spread to infect more than 100,000 people. Heres how th… [+53 chars]
